description.0: A prototype longbow discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. The arrow fired from this bow glimmers like a ray of moonlight.

0.0: Charged Attack hits on weak points increase Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by <cryo>36%</cryo> for 10s.

1.0: Charged Attack hits on weak points increase Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by <cryo>45%</cryo> for 10s.

2.0: Charged Attack hits on weak points increase Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by <cryo>54%</cryo> for 10s.

3.0: Charged Attack hits on weak points increase Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by <cryo>63%</cryo> for 10s.

4.0: Charged Attack hits on weak points increase Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by <cryo>72%</cryo> for 10s.
